revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|3o|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-dleesh|conclusive imperfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-DLÉÉZH|paint}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is [[paint#Verb|paint]]ing it # he/she is [[plaster#Verb|plaster]]ing it # he/she is [[frost#Verb|frost]]ing it (a cake) # he/she is [[spread#Verb|spread]]ing it (butter or jelly) ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|conclusive|∅/si}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yishdleesh|yiidleesh|deiidleesh|nidleesh|wohdleesh|daahdleesh|yidleesh|deidleesh|jidleesh|dajidleesh}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |shédléézh|shiidléézh|dashiidléézh|shínídléézh|shoodléézh|dashoodléézh|yizhdléézh|deizhdléézh|jizhdléézh|dajizhdléézh}} {{nv-verbtable|FUTURE |deeshdlish|diidlish|dadiidlish|díídlish|doohdlish|dadoohdlish|yidoodlish|deidoodlish|jidoodlish|dazhdoodlish}}
